trans-unit.source: Building Web Applications with React and Kotlin/JS guides you through the process of building a simple web application using the React framework, shows how a typesafe Kotlin DSL for HTML makes it convenient to build reactive DOM elements, and illustrates how to use third-party React components, and how to obtain information from APIs, while writing the whole application logic in pure Kotlin/JS.
trans-unit.target: 使用React和Kotlin / JS构建Web应用程序将指导您完成使用React框架构建简单Web应用程序的过程，展示用于HTML的类型安全的Kotlin DSL如何使构建响应式DOM元素更加方便，并说明如何使用第三方在使用纯Kotlin / JS编写整个应用程序逻辑时，使用React组件以及如何从API获取信息。

trans-unit.source: Building a Full Stack Web App with Kotlin Multiplatform teaches the concepts behind building an application that targets Kotlin/JVM and Kotlin/JS by building a client-server application that makes use of common code, serialization, and other multiplatform paradigms. It also provides a brief introduction into working with Ktor both as a server- and client-side framework.
trans-unit.target: 使用Kotlin Multiplatform构建全栈Web应用程序，通过构建使用通用代码，序列化和其他多平台范式的客户端服务器应用程序，讲授了构建针对Kotlin / JVM和Kotlin / JS的应用程序的概念。它还简要介绍了如何将Ktor作为服务器和客户端框架使用。

trans-unit.source: CValuesRef is designed to be used as Kotlin representation of pointer-typed parameters of C functions. When passing CPointer as CValuesRef to the Kotlin binding method, the C function receives exactly this pointer. Passing CValues has nearly the same semantics as passing by value: the C function receives the pointer to the temporary copy of these values, and the caller can't observe the modifications to this copy. The copy is valid until the C function returns. There are also other implementations of CValuesRef that provide temporary pointer, e.g. Kotlin Native specific refTo functions to pass primitive arrays directly to native.
trans-unit.target: CValuesRef设计为用作C函数的指针型参数的Kotlin表示。当将CPointer作为CValuesRef传递给Kotlin绑定方法时，C函数正好接收此指针。传递CValues的语义与按值传递的语义几乎相同：C函数接收指向这些值的临时副本的指针，而调用者无法观察对该副本的修改。该副本在C函数返回之前一直有效。也有其他提供临时指针的CValuesRef实现，例如Kotlin Native特定的refTo函数，将原始数组直接传递给native。

trans-unit.source: ContinuationInterceptor behaves like a polymorphic element, meaning that its implementation delegates get and minusKey to getPolymorphicElement and minusPolymorphicKey respectively. ContinuationInterceptor subtypes can be extracted from the coroutine context using either ContinuationInterceptor.Key or subtype key if it extends AbstractCoroutineContextKey.
trans-unit.target: ContinuationInterceptor就像一个多态元素，这意味着它的执行代表获得和minusKey到getPolymorphicElement和minusPolymorphicKey分别。ContinuationInterceptor亚型可以使用任一协程上下文中提取ContinuationInterceptor.Key或亚型键，如果它延伸AbstractCoroutineContextKey。

trans-unit.source: Continuation.intercepted can be used to acquire the intercepted continuation. Invocation of resume(Unit) on intercepted continuation guarantees that execution of both the coroutine and completion happens in the invocation context established by ContinuationInterceptor.
trans-unit.target: Continuation.intercepted可用于获取截获的连续性。在截获的延续上调用 resume(Unit) 可以确保协程的执行和完成都在ContinuationInterceptor建立的调用上下文中发生。

trans-unit.source: Kotlin Multiplatform reduces time spent writing and maintaining the same code for different platforms while retaining the flexibility and benefits of native programming. We continue investing our effort in multiplatform features and improvements:
trans-unit.target: Kotlin Multiplatform减少了为不同平台编写和维护相同代码所花费的时间，同时保留了本机编程的灵活性和优势。我们将继续在多平台功能和改进方面进行投入：

trans-unit.source: Multiplatform projects allow sharing common Kotlin code between multiple platforms, including Android, iOS, JVM, JavaScript, and native. Multiplatform libraries provide required APIs for the common Kotlin code and help develop shared parts of a project in Kotlin code in one place and share it with all or several target platforms.
trans-unit.target: 多平台项目允许在多个平台之间共享通用Kotlin代码，包括Android，iOS，JVM，JavaScript和本机。多平台库为通用Kotlin代码提供了必需的API，并在一处帮助以Kotlin代码开发项目的共享部分，并与所有或多个目标平台共享。

trans-unit.source: Multiplatform projects are supported between different Kotlin and Kotlin/Native targets. This is the way to share common Kotlin code between many platforms, including Android, iOS, server-side, JVM, client-side, JavaScript, CSS, and native.
trans-unit.target: 在不同的Kotlin和Kotlin / Native目标之间支持多平台项目。这是在许多平台之间共享通用Kotlin代码的方式，包括Android，iOS，服务器端，JVM，客户端，JavaScript，CSS和本机。

trans-unit.source: Multiplatform libraries provide the necessary APIs for the common Kotlin code and help to develop shared parts of a project in Kotlin code once and share it with all of the target platforms.
trans-unit.target: 多平台库为常见的Kotlin代码提供了必要的API，并有助于一次用Kotlin代码开发项目的共享部分，并将其与所有目标平台共享。

trans-unit.source: !! will will raise a NullPointerException if the value actually is null. So you could also use it if you really need to call a particular function and would rather have an exception if there's no object to call it on (maybeNull!!.importantFunction()), although a better solution (because an NPE isn't very informational) is this:
trans-unit.target: !! 如果该值实际上为null，则将引发 NullPointerException 。因此，如果确实需要调用特定函数，并且如果没有对象可以调用它，则可能会出现异常（ maybeNull!!.importantFunction() ），尽管有更好的解决方案（因为NPE不是非常有信息）是这样的：

trans-unit.source: !!asserts that an expression is non-null
trans-unit.target: !! 断言表达式为非空

trans-unit.source: ! - negation
trans-unit.target: ! -否定

trans-unit.source: "extract": styles are extracted into a separate file. They can then be included from an HTML page.
trans-unit.target: "extract" ：将样式提取到单独的文件中。然后可以将它们包含在HTML页面中。

trans-unit.source: "import": styles are processed as strings. This can be useful if you need access to the CSS from your code (e.g. val styles = require("main.css")).
trans-unit.target: "import" ：样式作为字符串处理。如果您需要从代码访问CSS（例如 val styles = require("main.css") ），这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: "inline" (default): styles are added to the global <style> tag.

trans-unit.source: -Xjsr305=@<fq.name>:{strict|warn|ignore} (since 1.1.60) to override the behavior for a single annotation, where <fq.name> is the fully qualified class name of the annotation. May appear several times for different annotations. This is useful for managing the migration state for a particular library.
trans-unit.target: -Xjsr305=@<fq.name>:{strict|warn|ignore} （从1.1.60开始）以覆盖单个注释的行为，其中 <fq.name> 是注释的完全限定的类名。对于不同的注释可能会出现几次。这对于管理特定库的迁移状态很有用。

trans-unit.source: -Xjsr305=under-migration:{strict|warn|ignore} (since 1.1.60) to override the behavior for the @UnderMigration annotations. Users may have different view on the migration status for the libraries: they may want to have errors while the official migration status is WARN, or vice versa, they may wish to postpone errors reporting for some until they complete their migration.
trans-unit.target: -Xjsr305=under-migration:{strict|warn|ignore} （从1.1.60开始）以覆盖 @UnderMigration 批注的行为。用户对于库的迁移状态可能有不同的看法：他们可能希望在正式迁移状态为 WARN 时出错，反之亦然，他们可能希望将某些错误的报告推迟到完成迁移之前。

trans-unit.source: -Xjsr305={strict|warn|ignore} to set up the behavior for non-@UnderMigration annotations. Custom nullability qualifiers, especially @TypeQualifierDefault, are already spread among many well-known libraries, and users may need to migrate smoothly when updating to the Kotlin version containing JSR-305 support. Since Kotlin 1.1.60, this flag only affects non-@UnderMigration annotations.
trans-unit.target: -Xjsr305={strict|warn|ignore} 设置非 @UnderMigration 注释的行为。自定义可空性限定符（尤其是 @TypeQualifierDefault ）已经散布在许多知名库中，并且用户在更新到包含JSR-305支持的Kotlin版本时可能需要平稳迁移。从Kotlin 1.1.60开始，此标记仅影响非 @UnderMigration 注释。

trans-unit.source: -Xjvm-default=compatibility should be used if you are adding a @JvmDefault to the methods that were available in the API before. This mode helps avoid compatibility breaks: all the interface implementations written for the previous versions will be fully compatible with the new version. However, the compatibility mode may add some overhead to the resulting bytecode size and affect the performance.
trans-unit.target: -Xjvm-default=compatibility 如果 @JvmDefault 添加到以前在API中可用的方法，则应使用-Xjvm-default = compatibility。此模式有助于避免兼容性中断：为先前版本编写的所有接口实现都将与新版本完全兼容。但是，兼容模式可能会增加最终字节码大小的开销，并影响性能。

trans-unit.source: -Xjvm-default=enabled should be used if you add only new methods with the @JvmDefault annotation. This includes adding the entire interface for your API.
trans-unit.target: -Xjvm-default=enabled 如果仅添加带有 @JvmDefault 批注的新方法，则应使用-Xjvm-default = enabled。这包括为您的API添加整个接口。

trans-unit.source: ?. is nice if you want to call a function on something that might be null. But what if you want to call a function that takes a non-null parameter, but the value you want to pass for that parameter might be null? Try run(), which is an extension function on Any? that takes a lambda with receiver as a parameter and invokes it on the value that it's called on, and use ?. to call run() only if the object is non-null:
trans-unit.target: ?. 如果您想在可能为null的东西上调用函数，那就很好了。但是，如果您要调用一个采用非null参数的函数，但要为该参数传递的值可能为null怎么办？试试 run() ，这是对 Any? 的扩展功能吗？它以带有接收方的lambda作为参数，并在其调用的值上调用它，并使用 ?. 仅在对象为非null时才调用 run() ：

trans-unit.source: ?. performs a safe call (calls a method or accesses a property if the receiver is non-null)
trans-unit.target: ?. 执行安全调用（如果接收者为非null，则调用方法或访问属性）

trans-unit.source: @Parcelize requires all serialized properties to be declared in the primary constructor. Android Extensions will issue a warning on each property with a backing field declared in the class body. Also, @Parcelize can't be applied if some of the primary constructor parameters are not properties.
trans-unit.target: @Parcelize 要求在主构造函数中声明所有序列化的属性。Android扩展程序会针对每个属性发出警告，并在类主体中声明一个支持字段。另外，如果某些主要构造函数参数不是属性，则无法应用 @Parcelize 。

trans-unit.source: CoroutineExceptionHandler is invoked only on uncaught exceptions — exceptions that were not handled in any other way. In particular, all children coroutines (coroutines created in the context of another Job) delegate handling of their exceptions to their parent coroutine, which also delegates to the parent, and so on until the root, so the CoroutineExceptionHandler installed in their context is never used. In addition to that, async builder always catches all exceptions and represents them in the resulting Deferred object, so its CoroutineExceptionHandler has no effect either.
trans-unit.target: CoroutineExceptionHandler 仅在未捕获的异常（未以任何其他方式处理的异常）上调用CoroutineExceptionHandler。特别是，所有子协程（在另一个Job上下文中创建的协程）将对其异常的处理委托给其父协程，该​​协程也委托给父协程，依此类推，直到根为止，因此从不使用在其上下文中安装的 CoroutineExceptionHandler 。除此之外，异步生成器始终捕获所有异常并将它们表示在生成的Deferred对象中，因此其 CoroutineExceptionHandler 也无效。

trans-unit.source: MigrationStatus.IGNORE makes the compiler ignore the nullability annotation completely.
trans-unit.target: MigrationStatus.IGNORE 使编译器完全忽略可空性注释。

trans-unit.source: MigrationStatus.STRICT makes annotation work as any plain nullability annotation, i.e. report errors for the inappropriate usages and affect the types in the annotated declarations as they are seen in Kotlin;
trans-unit.target: MigrationStatus.STRICT 使注释可以像任何普通的可空性注释一样工作，即报告错误用法的错误并影响注释声明中的类型（如在Kotlin中看到的那样）；

trans-unit.source: MyFrameworkAnnotation is annotated with the all-open meta-annotation com.my.Annotation, so it becomes an all-open annotation as well.
trans-unit.target: MyFrameworkAnnotation 使用全开放式元注释 com.my.Annotation 进行注释，因此它也成为全开放式注释。

trans-unit.source: NSMutableString Objective-C class is not available from Kotlin. All instances of NSMutableString are copied when passed to Kotlin.
trans-unit.target: NSMutableString Objective-C类从Kotlin不可用。 NSMutableString 的所有实例在传递给Kotlin时都会被复制。

trans-unit.source: NSNumber type is not automatically translated to Kotlin primitive types when used as a Swift/Objective-C parameter type or return value. The reason is that NSNumber type doesn't provide enough information about a wrapped primitive value type, i.e. NSNumber is statically not known to be a e.g. Byte, Boolean, or Double. So Kotlin primitive values should be cast to/from NSNumber manually (see below).
trans-unit.target: NSNumber 当用作Swift / Objective-C参数类型或返回值时，NSNumber类型不会自动转换为Kotlin基本类型。原因是 NSNumber 类型没有提供有关包装的原始值类型的足够信息，即 NSNumber 在静态上未知为 Byte ， Boolean 或 Double 。因此，应该手动将Kotlin原始值强制转换为 NSNumber 或从NSNumber强制转换（请参阅下文）。

trans-unit.target: NaN.sign 是 NaN

trans-unit.source: NaN.ulp is NaN
trans-unit.target: NaN.ulp 是 NaN

trans-unit.source: NaN is considered equal to itself
trans-unit.target: NaN 被认为与自己相等

trans-unit.source: NaN is considered greater than any other element including POSITIVE_INFINITY
trans-unit.target: NaN 被认为大于任何其他元素，包括 POSITIVE_INFINITY

trans-unit.source: NaN, NEGATIVE_INFINITY, and POSITIVE_INFINITY in Double and Float are now defined as const, so you can use them as annotation arguments.
trans-unit.target: NaN ， NEGATIVE_INFINITY 和 POSITIVE_INFINITY 在 Double 和 Float 现在被定义为 const ，所以你可以把它们作为注解的参数。

trans-unit.source: NativePlacement represents native memory with functions similar to malloc and free. There are several implementations of NativePlacement. The global one is called with kotlinx.cinterop.nativeHeap and don't forget to call the nativeHeap.free(..) function to free the memory after use.
trans-unit.target: NativePlacement 表示本机内存，其功能类似于 malloc 和 free 。有 NativePlacement 的几种实现。全局 kotlinx.cinterop.nativeHeap 用kotlinx.cinterop.nativeHeap调用，不要忘记调用 nativeHeap.free(..) 函数以在使用后释放内存。

trans-unit.source: ThreadLocal has first-class support and can be used with any primitive kotlinx.coroutines provides. It has one key limitation, though: when a thread-local is mutated, a new value is not propagated to the coroutine caller (because a context element cannot track all ThreadLocal object accesses), and the updated value is lost on the next suspension. Use withContext to update the value of the thread-local in a coroutine, see asContextElement for more details.
trans-unit.target: ThreadLocal 具有一流的支持，可与任何原始的 kotlinx.coroutines 提供的功能一起使用。但是，它有一个关键限制：当对线程局部变量进行更改时，不会将新值传播到协程调用者（因为上下文元素无法跟踪所有 ThreadLocal 对象访问），并且下一次挂起时更新的值会丢失。使用withContext更新协程中线程局部的值，有关更多详细信息，请参见asContextElement。

trans-unit.source: ThreadLocal has first-class support and can be used with any primitive kotlinx.coroutines provides. It has one key limitation: when thread-local is mutated, a new value is not propagated to the coroutine caller (as context element cannot track all ThreadLocal object accesses) and updated value is lost on the next suspension. Use withContext to update the value of the thread-local in a coroutine, see asContextElement for more details.
trans-unit.target: ThreadLocal 具有一流的支持，可与任何原始的 kotlinx.coroutines 提供的一起使用。它具有一个关键限制：更改线程本地变量时，不会将新值传播到协程调用程序（因为上下文元素无法跟踪所有 ThreadLocal 对象访问），并且在下一次挂起时会丢失更新的值。使用withContext更新协程中线程局部的值，有关更多详细信息，请参见asContextElement。

trans-unit.source: _.main_kand9s$ = main; exports the declared main function. The name on the left-hand side will be used to access to the function from outside the module. The name contains a mangled word (kand9s$). This happens because you can have overloaded functions in Kotlin and need a way to translate them to their corresponding JavaScript ones. To change the generated function name with a custom name, use the @JsName annotation.
trans-unit.target: _.main_kand9s$ = main; 导出声明的 main 函数。左侧的名称将用于从模块外部访问该功能。该名称包含一个 kand9s$ 单词（kand9s $）。发生这种情况是因为您可以在Kotlin中拥有重载的函数，并且需要一种将其转换为相应的JavaScript函数的方法。要使用自定义名称更改生成的函数名称，请使用 @JsName 批注。

trans-unit.source: also is good for performing some actions that take the context object as an argument. Use also for additional actions that don't alter the object, such as logging or printing debug information. Usually, you can remove the calls of also from the call chain without breaking the program logic.
trans-unit.target: also 有利于执行一些将上下文对象作为参数的操作。使用 also 适用于不改变对象的其他操作，如记录或打印的调试信息。通常，您可以在不中断程序逻辑的情况下从调用链中 also 删除调用。

trans-unit.source: also is like apply: it takes the receiver, does some action on it, and returns that receiver. The difference is that in the block inside apply the receiver is available as this, while in the block inside also it's available as it (and you can give it another name if you want). This comes handy when you do not want to shadow this from the outer scope:
trans-unit.target: also 就像 apply ：它需要接收器，的确它的一些行动，并返回该接收器。所不同的是，在块内 apply 的接收器可作为 this ，而在块内 also 很可作为 it （你可以给它另外一个名字，如果你想）。这都方便的时候你不想阴影 this 从外范围：

trans-unit.source: browserDevelopmentWebpack creates development artifacts, which are larger in size, but take little time to create. As such, use the browserDevelopmentWebpack tasks during active development.
trans-unit.target: browserDevelopmentWebpack 会创建开发工件，这些工件较大，但创建时间很少。这样，在活动开发过程中使用 browserDevelopmentWebpack 任务。

trans-unit.source: browserProductionWebpack applies dead code elimination to the generated artifacts and minifies the resulting JavaScript file, which takes more time, but generates executables that are smaller in size. As such, use the browserProductionWebpack task when preparing your project for production use.
trans-unit.target: browserProductionWebpack 将无效代码消除应用于生成的工件，并最小化生成的JavaScript文件，这花费更多时间，但生成的可执行文件尺寸较小。因此，在准备生产用项目时，请使用 browserProductionWebpack 任务。

This option can also be used to workaround a bug in the interop itself.

trans-unit.source: expression - the replacement expression. The replacement expression is interpreted in the context of the symbol being used, and can reference members of enclosing classes etc. For function calls, the replacement expression may contain argument names of the deprecated function, which will be substituted with actual parameters used in the call being updated. The imports used in the file containing the deprecated function or property are NOT accessible; if the replacement expression refers on any of those imports, they need to be specified explicitly in the imports parameter.

trans-unit.source: hashCode() returns an integer that can be used by hash tables and for shortcutting complex equality comparisons (objects that are equal according to equals() must have the same hash code, so if two objects' hash codes are different, the objects cannot be equal)

trans-unit.source: implementation dependencies are used during compilation and at runtime for the current module, but are not exposed for compilation of other modules depending on the one with the implementation dependency. Theimplementation dependency kind should be used for dependencies needed for the internal logic of a module. If a module is an endpoint application which is not published, it may use implementation dependencies instead of api ones.
trans-unit.target: implementation 依赖关系在当前模块的编译期间和运行时使用，但对于具有 implementation 依赖关系的模块，不会公开用于其他模块的编译。的 implementation 依赖种类应被用于所需的模块的内部逻辑依赖关系。如果模块是未发布的端点应用程序，则它可以使用 implementation 依赖关系而不是 api 依赖关系。
